TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_nipaluma-siwasay, title = nipaluma-siwasay, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/nipaluma-siwasay} }

S.FORM: == siwasay == 長花九頭獅子草 kagak kakuniza subal :真核域 Eukaryota salaedan :植物界 Plantae panan :木蘭植物門 Magnoliophyta upiz :木蘭綱 Magnoliopsida mata :玄參目 Scrophulariales sapamat :爵床科 Acanthaceae mikitinay :九頭獅子草屬 Peristrophe hicahicaay :長花九頭獅子草 P. roxburghiana u siwkay nu nipaluma u sanek nu nipaluma malaheci tu imelang pasubana i cacudadan a lacul u zuma a cidekay a kamu, saungay misapayu' a cidekay u sulit nu zuma a kamu-Hulam atu Amilika 長花九頭獅子草(學名:Peristrophe roxburghiana) .

== siwasay == 長花九頭獅子草 kagak kakoniza sobal :真核域 Eokaryota salaedan :植物界 Plantae panan :木蘭植物門 Magnoliophyta opiz :木蘭綱 Magnoliopsida mata :玄參目 Scropholariales sapamat :爵床科 Acanthaceae mikitinay :九頭獅子草屬 Peristrophe hicahicaay :長花九頭獅子草 P. roxborghiana o siwkay no nipaloma o sanek no nipaloma malaheci to imelang pasobana i cacodadan a lacol o zoma a cidekay a kamo, saongay misapayo' a cidekay o solit no zoma a kamo-Holam ato Amilika 長花九頭獅子草(學名:Peristrophe roxborghiana) .
